channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise for 64-bit Systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise for 64-bit Systems

item.title: CVE-2020-0901|2024-08-04T06:18:03.262Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20365%20apps%20for%20enterprise%20for%2064-bit%20systems
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Excel software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.
